title: ompss broken dependencies
body:
-----

Some dependencies of the ompss seems to be broken. 

### Expected Result

ompss and dependencies properly installed

### Actual Result

`flex@2.6.4` is not compiling, `elfutils` default is `0.163` but it is also broken, the newest one `0.170` is also not compiling.
When using this spec `spack install -v ompss ^hwloc@1.11.9^flex@2.6.3^elfutils@0.170`
it fails at `dyninst`.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install -v ompss ^hwloc@1.11.9^flex@2.6.3^elfutils@0.170
```

### Information on your system

The spack-build.out file:
```console

==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'

4 errors found in build log:

             TI_INDEX_DISABLE_SERIALIZATION -DCOMMON_LIB -DUSE_PARSE_API -DWITHOUT_SYMLITE -DWITH_SYMTAB_API -Darch_64bit -Darch_x86_64 -Dbug_force_terminate_failure -

             2ucqu6syhqu6/include/libelf -I/home/vgarciap/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-6.4.0/libdwarf-20160507-lgitxpqq6g4pbwkjjste5mzl4zwrvojg/include
              -I/home/vgarciap/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-6.4.0/boost-1.67.0-buwihup74cdjkj2di4br37islwvkt6rk/include -I/tmp/vgarciap/spack-stage/spa
             ck-stage-3wPUwq/dyninst/spack-build -I/tmp/vgarciap/spack-stage/spack-stage-3wPUwq/dyninst/spack-build/common/h -I/tmp/vgarciap/spack-stage/spack-stage-3w
```
